actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Milton G. and Evelyn Hedstrom.

summary.text: Declares that if a certain individual and his spouse comply with specified requirements, the money they received as a distribution from the profit-sharing plan of a certain corporation shall be considered as transferred to such individual's retirement account and shall not be included in his taxable income for the taxable year 1976.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Milton G. and Evelyn Hedstrom.
